mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Popup (adminId, storeId, title, content, time, address, startDate, endDate, latitude, longitude, notice, storeUrl, snsUrl, parking, fee, noKids, pet, wifi, viewCount) VALUES (#{admin.id}, #{store.id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{time}, #{address}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{notice}, #{storeUrl}, #{snsUrl}, #{parking}, #{fee}, #{noKids}, #{pet}, #{wifi}, #{viewCount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Popup p LEFT JOIN Store s ON p.storeId = s.id LEFT JOIN Admin a ON p.adminId = a.id WHERE p.id=#{id}

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.address, p.startDate, p.endDate, s.id AS storeId, s.storeName, s.image FROM Popup p LEFT JOIN PopupLike l ON p.id = l.popupId LEFT JOIN Store s ON p.storeId = s.id WHERE
#{date} BETWEEN p.startDate AND p.endDate
CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN p.startDate AND p.endDate
GROUP BY p.id, p.title, p.address, p.startDate, p.endDate, s.id, s.storeName, s.image ORDER BY p.endDate LIMIT 8;

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.address, p.startDate, p.endDate, s.id AS storeId, s.storeName, s.image, COUNT(l.popupId) AS likeCount FROM Popup p LEFT JOIN PopupLike l ON p.id = l.popupId LEFT JOIN Store s ON p.storeId = s.id GROUP BY p.id, p.title, p.address, p.startDate, p.endDate, s.id, s.storeName, s.image ORDER BY likeCount DESC LIMIT 6;

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.address, p.startDate, p.endDate, s.id AS storeId, s.storeName, s.image, pl.userId FROM Popup p LEFT JOIN PopupLike pl ON p.id = pl.popupId LEFT JOIN Store s ON p.storeId = s.id WHERE (CASE WHEN NULLIF(#{sort}, '') IS NULL OR #{sort} = 'all' THEN 1 WHEN #{sort} = 'open' AND CURDATE() BETWEEN p.startDate AND p.endDate THEN 1 WHEN #{sort} = 'soon' AND CURDATE() < p.startDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END = 1) AND pl.userId = #{user.id} GROUP BY p.id, p.title, p.address, p.startDate, p.endDate, s.id, s.storeName, s.image, pl.userId ORDER BY p.endDate;

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.address, p.startDate, p.endDate, s.id AS storeId, s.storeName, s.image FROM Popup p LEFT JOIN PopupLike pl ON p.id = pl.popupId LEFT JOIN Store s ON p.storeId = s.id
WHERE (p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%') OR p.address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%') OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM popupTag pt JOIN tag t ON pt.tagId = t.id WHERE pt.popupId = p.id AND t.tagName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%'))) GROUP BY p.id, p.title, p.address, p.startDate, p.endDate, s.id, s.storeName, s.image ORDER BY p.endDate LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT viewCount FROM Popup WHERE id = #{popupId};
mapper.update: UPDATE Popup SET viewCount = viewCount+1 WHERE id=#{popupId}
